isis.stitle: FRONT DRIVE AXLE WHEEL ENDS: FABCO SDA-12 - REASSEMBLY

step1.para: Gasket Eliminator #515 (purple) as the gasket material. Gaskets are not and should not be used in the reassembly of the drive wheel ends. Refer to Figure 43 for application pattern.

figure.caption: Figure 30. Application Patterns of Loctite Gasket Eliminator

calloutgroup.callout1: A. APPLY 3/32 TO 1/8 INCH BEAD TO INBOARD SURFACE OF AXLE SHAFT FLANGE
B. APPLY 3/32 TO 1/8 INCH BEAD TO INBOARD FACE OF SPINDLE FLANGE
C. APPLY 3/32 TO 1/8 INCH BEAD TO OUTBOARD FACE OF AXLE HOUSING FLANGE

step1.para: To avoid lubricant leakage, use Loctite Make-A-Gasket #2 (grayish brown) to the threads.
Refer to TORQUE CHART for recommended values in tightening bolts and nuts.
Coat all splines and seals with Lubriplate #105 Grease or equivalent to provide initial lubrication.
Flanged-end bearing drivers are recommended to be used when installing bearings.
Flanged type guides or drivers are to be used to install seals. A soft hammer or drift can be made to install seals. Care is to be exercised.
If the drive wheel end was partially disassembled, use the reverse of the disassembly to reassemble the unit.
